at.granul.mason

Class ChartedGUIState

  • java.lang.Object
    • sim.display.GUIState
      • at.granul.mason.ChartedGUIState
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FlockersWithUI, SchellingWithUI

    public abstract class ChartedGUIState
extends sim.display.GUIState
    Automatic charting of GUI model data as defined in a DataCollector. To allow for that simply extend the class and provide a @link #getDataCollector() method.

    Can also produce a layout that matches the screen (@link #layout(DisplayFrame)).

    copyright by Roman Seidl, 2015

    Licensed under the Academic Free License version 3.0 See the file "LICENSE" for more information
